name: General Contracting
description: Comprehensive management and execution of construction projects from start to finish.

name: Construction Management
description: Supervision and oversight of construction projects, ensuring timely and within-budget completion.

name: Design-Build
description: Integrated design and construction services to streamline project delivery.

name: Pre-Construction Services
description: Planning, cost estimating, and scheduling services to prepare projects before construction begins.

name: Site Preparation
description: Clearing, grading, and preparing construction sites for building.

name: Foundation Work
description: Installation of foundations, including excavation, formwork, and pouring concrete.

name: Structural Steel Erection
description: Erecting steel structures, including beams, columns, and frameworks.

name: Concrete Construction
description: Pouring and finishing concrete for foundations, floors, and structural elements.

name: Masonry Work
description: Installation of bricks, blocks, and stonework for structural and aesthetic purposes.

name: Electrical Installation
description: Complete electrical systems installation, including wiring, lighting, and controls.

name: Plumbing and Piping
description: Installation of plumbing systems, including water supply, drainage, and gas lines.

name: HVAC Installation
description: Installation of heating, ventilation, and air conditioning systems.

name: Roofing Services
description: Installation and repair of roofing systems, including shingles, tiles, and flat roofs.

name: Interior Finishing
description: Final interior touches, including drywall, painting, flooring, and trim work.

name: Landscaping and Site Development
description: Design and installation of outdoor spaces, including lawns, gardens, and hardscaping.
